title: RORA activates gene expression
description: As inferred from mouse, RORA binds ROR elements (ROREs) in DNA and recruits the coactivators PPARGC1A (PGC-1alpha) and p300 (EP300, a histone acetylase) to activate transcription.  View original pathway at [http://www.reactome.org/PathwayBrowser/#DIAGRAM=1368082 Reactome].
